artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: Alexander Bannerman
inscription:
Signature, Title and, Inscription

on sheet in black:  Vol.2.87 /  in image in black: ANTHONY VAN DYCK / below image on sheet: Ant. Vandyck pinx.   Alex'r Bannerman sculp. / From an original in the Collection of the Hon'ble Mr. Walpole | on sheet in pencil: 2-506
title: Portrait of Anthony van Dyck
